title: Create sample project data file
body:
Add a new `projects.js` file inside `src/data/`.
Include fields like: `title`, `slug`, `summary`, `techStack`, `githubUrl`, and `demoUrl`.

title: Build `<ProjectCard />` component
body:
Create a reusable card component in `src/components/` that takes project data as props.
Display image, title, summary, and links.

title: Implement `/projects` grid layout
body:
Use CSS grid or Bootstrap row/col to layout all projects in a grid view.
Render using mapped `projects.js` data.

title: Add `/project/:slug` dynamic route
body:
Create a new page under `src/pages/ProjectDetail.jsx` that fetches project by slug.
Display full content with conditional logic.

title: Add sample images to `/assets`
body:
Store thumbnail and detail view images for at least 3 sample projects inside `src/assets/`.
Reference them in the data file.

title: Add category filters to projects view
body:
Allow filtering by category or tech tag.
Consider dropdown or pill-style buttons to toggle filter state.

title: Add fallback 404 page
body: Create a simple `NotFound.jsx` component under `src/pages/` and route to it for unknown paths.

title: Setup unit testing with Vitest
body:
Install Vitest + React Testing Library.
Configure basic `vitest.config.js` and add example test file in `__tests__/`.

title: Write tests for `<ProjectCard />`
body:
Verify it renders title, summary, and links.
Test with different sets of mock props using Vitest.

title: Implement Resume page with Markdown
body:
Add `Resume.md` to `src/data/` and render it via a Markdown parser (e.g. `react-markdown`).
Link from Navbar to `/resume`.
